title: Kubernetes
description: Kubernetes is an open-source container orchestration platform.

snippets.Basic Commands:
# Get resources
kubectl get pods
kubectl get services
kubectl get deployments

# Describe
kubectl describe pod pod-name

# Logs
kubectl logs pod-name

# Delete
kubectl delete pod pod-name
snippets.Pods:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
snippets.Deployments:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
snippets.Services:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: nginx
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  type: LoadBalancer
snippets.ConfigMaps:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
data:
  database_url: "postgres://db:5432"
  api_key: "secret-key"

# Use in pod
envFrom:
- configMapRef:
    name: app-config
snippets.Secrets:
# Create secret
kubectl create secret generic db-secret \
  --from-literal=password=mypassword

# Use in pod
env:
- name: DB_PASSWORD
  valueFrom:
    secretKeyRef:
      name: db-secret
      key: password
snippets.Scaling:
# Scale deployment
kubectl scale deployment nginx-deployment --replicas=5

# Autoscale
kubectl autoscale deployment nginx-deployment \
  --min=2 --max=10 --cpu-percent=80
snippets.Namespaces:
# Create namespace
kubectl create namespace dev

# List namespaces
kubectl get namespaces

# Use namespace
kubectl get pods -n dev
kubectl config set-context --current --namespace=dev
